## CO2 data from Mauna Loa

<https://gml.noaa.gov/ccgg/trends/data.html>

```{r}
cn <- c("Year", "Month", "DDate", "CO2_ppm",
        "X1", "X2", "X3", "X4")
CO2 <- readr::read_table(file = here::here("data", "co2_mm_mlo.txt"), col_names = cn) |>
  dplyr::select(Year:CO2_ppm) |>
  dplyr::mutate(Date = paste("01", month.abb[Month], Year)) |>
  dplyr::mutate(Date = as.Date(Date, format = "%d %b %Y"))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = CO2,
       mapping = aes(x = Date, y = CO2_ppm)) +
  geom_line()
```
